FUNC.NAME: trioptic39redundancy
FUNC.SYNOPSIS: is used to set the trioptic39 Redundancy property. If this flag is set, the bar code must be decoded twice before being accepted.

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner to read only trioptic39 labels with the Redundancy property set
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="trioptic39:enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="trioptic39Redundancy:true"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="enabled">

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner to read only trioptic39 labels with the Redundancy property set
The following example enables the scanner to read only trioptic39 labels with the Redundancy property set
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-trioptic39" Content="enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-trioptic39Redundancy" Content="true"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-enabled" Content="SCN1">

ADDITIONAL.PLATFORM: All supported devices except: Android devices.
ADDITIONAL.APPLIES: Transient - Decoder settings are only guaranteed to persist until the Scanner is disabled
ADDITIONAL.REQ: Scanner or Imager module and device that supports trioptic39.
